titleStmt.title: SII 14.259: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 259. (A.R. No. 56 of 1929.) ŚIVAPURI, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SECOND prākāra OF THE SVAYAMPRAKĀŚA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record dated in the 24th year of Tribhuvanachakravartin Śrīvallabha registers a gift of land and a house-site for the maintenance of a maṭha at Śivapuri called the Aḻagiya-maṇavāḷaṉ by Aḻagiya-maṇavāḷaṉ Uḍaiyanambi alias A agaimāṉ of Tirunallūr, a merchant of Aruviyūr alias Dēsi-uyyavanda-paṭṭaṇam in Kēraḷaśiṅgavaḷanāḍu. The land was purchased from Śeṭṭi Jātavēdaṉ. The and measure in use at this time was aruḷnidi-kōl.
Among the boundaries of the land are mentioned the names Muḍigoṇḍa-Śōḻappērēri and Śōḻapāṇḍiya-vadi.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tribhuvaṉacakkaravartikaḷ śrīvaladevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 4vatu keraḷa ciṅkavaḷanaāṭṭu Aruviyūrāṉa
teci Uyyavanta paṭṭaṇattu viyāpāri tirunallūruṭaiyāṉ Aḻakiya maṇavāḷaṉ Uṭaiya nampiyāṉa
aḷakaimāneṉ Innāṭṭu brammadeyam nirupacekarac caruppetimaṅkalattu tiruttān toṉṟi Ī
śvaramuṭaiyār civapuriyil Aḻakiya maṇavāḷaṉ maṭattukku cantirātittavar maṭappuṟamākak koṇṭu vi
ṭṭa pūmiyāvatu . muṭikoṇṭa coḻappererikkīḻ perumaṭṭiyūr vayaṟ teṉpilāṟṟu śrīcoḻa
pāṇṭiyavatikkuk kiḻakku Iraṇṭāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu śrī Irājentra coḻavāykkālukku teṟku muṉṟāñ catira
ttu vaṭakkaṭaiya ceṭṭi jātavetaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭa Uṭaiyāṉ vacakkal Aḷavu ko laruṇi
tiyāl nilam Araimāviṉ kaḻ mukkāle Araikkālukkum perunāṉkellaiyāvaṉa . kiḻellai I
cceṭṭi jātavetaṉ kiṭanta perumāṉukku meṟkum tennellai kavucikaṉ nīṟaṇintāṉ jātavetaṉ kuḷattāḷ
ceykku vaṭakkum melellai Iccey meṟtalaiye teṟku nokkippoṉa vāyk kālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭa
vellai Iccey vaṭatalaiyey kiḻakku nokkippoṉa vāykkālukku teṟkum Iv vicainta perunāṉke
llaik kuṭpaṭṭa nilamuṟṟum ceṭṭi jātavetaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭu cantirātittavaṟ maṭappuṟamākac ce
lvutāka koṇṭu viṭṭeṉ tirunallūruṭaiyāṉ Aḻakiya maṇavāḷaṉ Uṭaiyanampiyeṉ . Aḷa
kaimāṉ koṇṭu viṭṭa maṭappuṟattukku maṉaiyāvatu . civapuriyil nampi keravil vaṭaciṟakil melaittalai maṉai Oru maṉaiyum
turavil pātiyum koṇṭu Immaṭattukkuk kaṟiyum paccaiyum Iṭuvatāka piḷḷai Āti taṇṭeśvarappiḷḷaiyār pakkal koṇṭu vi
ṭaiyāṉ tirunallūruṭaiyāṉ Aḻakiya maṇavāḷaṉ Uṭaiyanampiyāṉa Aḷakaimāṉṉāṉa Anantāṉanampi ceyvitta tanmam
cantirātittavaṟ celvutākac ceytukuṭuttom Ittevar kaṉmikaḷeram . Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai ..
Digital edition of SII 14.259 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
